properties.name: app.auth.jwt.expiration
properties.description: Expiration of the JWT, in seconds.

properties.name: app.auth.refresh-session-expiration
properties.description: Maximum inactivity period for a refresh session, in days. This value is used in a sliding-expiration model: each successful refresh extends the session's expiration by this duration. Note: under this model, sessions may never expire if they are frequently refreshed.

properties.name: app.auth.cookie-secure
properties.description: Flag indicating whether authentication cookies should be marked as secure. This flag is so it can be disabled in non-HTTPS development environments.
